mapper.update: update subscription_plans set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price_monthly = #{priceMonthly,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ai_quota = #{aiQuota,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where subscription_plan_sid = #{subscriptionPlanSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select subscription_plan_sid, name, price_monthly, ai_quota, description, created_at from subscription_plans
